name: Test & Validation Agent
tagline: Accelerates test planning, execution tracking, and results analysis
overview: The Test & Validation Agent assists engineering teams with test planning, execution tracking, and results analysis. It helps create test matrices, monitors test progress, identifies anomalies in results, and generates summary reports—reducing administrative burden so engineers can focus on problem-solving.
whatItDoes: Generates test matrices from requirements and specifications
Tracks test execution status across multiple programs
Identifies anomalies and outliers in test results
Compares results against historical baselines and specifications
Creates summary reports and executive dashboards
prompts: Generate a durability test matrix for this engine variant
Which tests are behind schedule this week?
Flag any results that deviate more than 2 sigma from baseline
Compare these emission results to the last three programs
Summarize test status for the weekly engineering review
inputs: Test execution logs and status data

impact.description: Faster generation of test matrices and plans
Earlier identification of anomalies in results

guardrails: Assistive only—engineers interpret all test results
Does not make pass/fail determinations autonomously
Anomaly flags require human investigation and validation
Safety-critical test results require formal engineering review
All comparisons include statistical confidence levels
